name: MAC FR 2023
description: The 2-Column theme is our most popular theme for good reason - Its balance of image and action is familiar to users and still provides room for customization and branding.

components.name: root
components.description: Component meant for declaring campaign level variables and cross-campaign inheritance

components.name: friend_email_capture
components.description: Click handling for share links and the email capture enabled friend landing experience.

components.name: friend_landing
components.description: Click handling for share links and the friend landing experience.

components.name: promotion
components.description: An in-app, onsite, or email call to action.

components.name: promotion_viewed
components.description: An in-app, onsite, or email call to action has been viewed.

components.name: promotion_clicked
components.description: An in-app, onsite, or email call to action, or a promotion link posted on social channels, has been clicked or tapped.

components.name: confirmation
components.description: The call to action that lives on your order confirmation page and often auto-pops the share experience.

components.name: global_footer
components.description: The call to action that lives in the global footer of your page.

components.name: global_header
components.description: The call to action that lives in the global header of your page.

components.name: mobile_footer
components.description: The call to action that lives in the global footer of your mobile website.

components.name: mobile_header
components.description: The call to action that lives in the global header of your mobile website.

components.name: overlay
components.description: The floater call to action that lives in the bottom corner of your page.

components.name: mobile_menu
components.description: The call to action that lives in the menu of your mobile website.

components.name: friend_pending_reward_email
components.description: An email sent to a friend after some rewardable event has occurred but before the reward is actually sent to the friend.

components.name: advocate_pending_reward_email
components.description: An email sent to an advocate after some rewardable event has occurred but before the reward is actually sent to the advocate.

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Entries
metrics.description: Number of times the Friend Pending Reward Email was entered

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Entries
metrics.description: Number of unique times the Friend Pending Reward Email was entered

words.singular_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Entry Event
words.plural_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Entry Events
words.rate_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Entry Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Entry Events

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Entries
metrics.description: Number of times the Advocate Pending Reward Email was entered

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Entries
metrics.description: Number of unique times the Advocate Pending Reward Email was entered

words.singular_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Entry Event
words.plural_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Entry Events
words.rate_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Entry Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Entry Events

metrics.name: First-Time Impressions
metrics.description: Number of first-time impressions on in-app or onsite promotions or Extole-sent emails that have been opened (does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources)

metrics.name: Reach
metrics.description: Unique people viewing in-app or onsite promotions or emails (does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources)

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Triggers
metrics.description: Number of times the Friend Pending Reward Email was triggered

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Triggers
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Friend Pending Reward Email was triggered

words.singular_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Triggered Event
words.plural_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Triggered Events
words.rate_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Triggered Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Triggered Events

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggers
metrics.description: Number of times the Advocate Pending Reward Email was triggered

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggers
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Advocate Pending Reward Email was triggered

words.singular_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggered Event
words.plural_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggered Events
words.rate_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggered Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Triggered Events

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Throughs
metrics.description: Number of clicks on in-app promotions, onsite promotions, email promotions, or promotion links posted on social channels

metrics.name: Unique Promotion Clicks
metrics.description: Unique people clicking on in-app promotions, onsite promotions, email promotions, or promotion links posted on social channels

metrics.name: Promotion Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Promotion clicks/Impressions) * 100. Promotion Click-Through Rate is the ratio of clicks on promotions to impressions on promotions (Impressions does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources).

metrics.name: Unique Promotion Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Unique promotion clicks/Reach) * 100. Unique Promotion Click-Through Rate is the ratio of unique people clicking on promotions to unique people viewing promotions (Reach does not include links posted on social channels or untracked sources).

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Number of times the Friend Pending Reward Email was delivered

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Friend Pending Reward Email was delivered

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Friend Pending Reward Email deliveries/Friend Pending Reward Email triggers) * 100. Friend Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of deliveries of Friend Pending Reward Emails to triggers of Friend Pending Reward Emails.

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Unique Friend Pending Reward Email deliveries/Unique Friend Pending Reward Email triggers) * 100. Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of unique people to whom a Friend Pending Reward Email was delivered to unique people to whom a Friend Pending Reward Email was triggered.

words.singular_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Delivered Event
words.plural_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Delivered Events
words.rate_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Delivered Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Delivered Events

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Number of times the Advocate Pending Reward Email was delivered

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Deliveries
metrics.description: Unique people to whom a Advocate Pending Reward Email was delivered

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Advocate Pending Reward Email deliveries/Advocate Pending Reward Email triggers) * 100. Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of deliveries of Advocate Pending Reward Emails to triggers of Advocate Pending Reward Emails.

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate
metrics.description: (Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email deliveries/Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email triggers) * 100. Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivery Rate is the ratio of unique people to whom a Advocate Pending Reward Email was delivered to unique people to whom a Advocate Pending Reward Email was triggered.

words.singular_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivered Event
words.plural_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivered Events
words.rate_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivered Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Delivered Events

metrics.name: Shares
metrics.description: Number of shares

metrics.name: Share Rate
metrics.description: (Shares/Share experience views) * 100. Share Rate is the ratio of shares to share experience views.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Shares
metrics.description: Number of shares that are highest quality

metrics.name: Advocates
metrics.description: Unique people who have advocated on your behalf (e.g. the user has shared, or one of their friends has participated in a program using the user's link or code)

metrics.name: Advocacy Rate
metrics.description: (Advocates/Promo clicks) * 100. Advocacy Rate is the ratio of advocates to people clicking on promotions.

metrics.name: Advocations
metrics.description: Behaviors that indicate brand-building activities, such as sharing or referring

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of opens of Friend Pending Reward Emails

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Opens
metrics.description: Unique people opening a Friend Pending Reward Email

metrics.name: Friend Pending Reward Email Open Rate
metrics.description: (Friend Pending Reward Email opens/Friend Pending Reward Email deliveries) * 100. Friend Pending Reward Email Open Rate is the ratio of opens of Friend Pending Reward Emails to deliveries of Friend Pending Reward Emails.

metrics.name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Open Rate
metrics.description: (Unique Friend Pending Reward Email opens/Unique Friend Pending Reward Email deliveries) * 100. Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Open Rate is the ratio of unique people opening a Friend Pending Reward Email to unique people to whom a Friend Pending Reward Email was delivered.

words.singular_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Opened Event
words.plural_noun_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Opened Events
words.rate_name: Friend Pending Reward Email Opened Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Friend Pending Reward Email Opened Events

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of opens of Advocate Pending Reward Emails

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Opens
metrics.description: Unique people opening a Advocate Pending Reward Email

metrics.name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Open Rate
metrics.description: (Advocate Pending Reward Email opens/Advocate Pending Reward Email deliveries) * 100. Advocate Pending Reward Email Open Rate is the ratio of opens of Advocate Pending Reward Emails to deliveries of Advocate Pending Reward Emails.

metrics.name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Open Rate
metrics.description: (Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email opens/Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email deliveries) * 100. Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Open Rate is the ratio of unique people opening a Advocate Pending Reward Email to unique people to whom a Advocate Pending Reward Email was delivered.

words.singular_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Opened Event
words.plural_noun_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Opened Events
words.rate_name: Advocate Pending Reward Email Opened Event Rate
words.person_counting_name: Unique Advocate Pending Reward Email Opened Events

metrics.name: Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of views of share emails

metrics.name: Share Email Reach
metrics.description: Unique people opening a share email

metrics.name: Highest Quality Email Opens
metrics.description: Number of views of share emails that are highest quality

metrics.name: Share Clicks
metrics.description: Number of clicks on share links

metrics.name: Unique Share Clicks
metrics.description: Unique people clicking on a share

metrics.name: Share Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Share clicks/Shares) * 100. Share Click-Through Rate is the ratio of clicks on share links to shares.

metrics.name: Unique Share Click-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Unique share clicks/Advocates) * 100. Unique Share Click-Through Rate is the ratio of unique people clicking on a share to unique advocates.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Share Clicks
metrics.description: Number of clicks on share links that are highest quality

metrics.name: Highest Quality Share-Through Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality share clicks/Highest quality shares) * 100. Highest Quality Share Click-Through Rate is the ratio of highest quality clicks on share links to highest quality shares.

metrics.name: Friend Visits
metrics.description: Number of visits to a share destination

metrics.name: Friend Visitors
metrics.description: Unique people loading the friend landing experience

metrics.name: Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups

metrics.name: Unique Signups
metrics.description: Unique people signing up

metrics.name: Signup Rate
metrics.description: (Signups/Share clicks) * 100. Signup Rate is the ratio of signups to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Unique Signup Rate
metrics.description: (Unique signups/Unique share clicks) * 100. Unique Signup Rate is the ratio of unique people signup up to unique people clicking on a share.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Signups
metrics.description: Number of highest quality signups

metrics.name: New to File Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Rewarded Signups
metrics.description: Number of signups that have resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Signup Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality signups/Highest quality share clicks) * 100. Highest Quality Signup Rate is the ratio of highest quality signups to highest quality clicks on share links.

metrics.name: New to File Signup Rate
metrics.description: (New to file signups/Share clicks) * 100. New to File Signup Rate is the ratio of new to file signups to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Signup Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded signups/Signups) * 100. Signup Reward Rate is the ratio of signups that have resulted in a friend reward to total signups.

metrics.name: Friend Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to friends

metrics.name: Friends Rewarded
metrics.description: Unique people receiving a friend reward

metrics.name: Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions

metrics.name: Converters
metrics.description: Unique customers

metrics.name: Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Conversions/Share clicks) * 100. Conversion Rate is the ratio of conversions to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Unique Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Converters/Unique share clicks) * 100. Unique Conversion Rate is the ratio of unique customers to unique people clicking on a share.

metrics.name: Highest Quality Conversions
metrics.description: Number of highest quality conversions

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Rewarded Friend Conversions
metrics.description: Number of friend conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Value of Rewarded Conversions
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (Highest quality friend conversions/Highest quality share clicks) * 100. Highest Quality Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are highest quality to clicks on share links that are highest quality.

metrics.name: New to File Friend Conversion Rate
metrics.description: (New to file friend conversions/Share clicks) * 100. New to File Friend Conversion Rate is the ratio of friend conversions that are new to file to clicks on share links.

metrics.name: Friend Conversion Reward Rate
metrics.description: (Rewarded conversions/Conversions) * 100. Conversion Reward Rate is the ratio of conversions that have resulted in an advocate reward to total conversions.

metrics.name: Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from conversions

metrics.name: Friend Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in a friend reward

metrics.name: New to File Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all friend events that are new to file

metrics.name: Highest Quality Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all friend events that are highest quality

metrics.name: Friend Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used a friend reward

metrics.name: New to File Conversion Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all conversions that are new to your customer list

metrics.name: Advocate Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards issued to advocates

metrics.name: Advocates Rewarded
metrics.description: Unique people receiving an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Rewarded Friend Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that resulted in an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Redeemed Reward Revenue
metrics.description: Sum of revenue from all events that used an advocate reward

metrics.name: Advocate Redeemed Rewards
metrics.description: Number of rewards redeemed by advocates

metrics.name: Advocate Reward Redemption Rate
metrics.description: (Redeemed advocate rewards/Advocate rewards) * 100. Advocate Reward Redemption Rate is the ratio of rewards redeemed by advocates to rewards issued to advocates.
